com.contactdialer.common

类 ExtDataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.contactdialer.common.ExtDataBase

  • public class ExtDataBase
extends Object
    Provide access to External Database stored in SDCard. If the database does not exist, the class will create it automatically. This class should be initiated by Activity Context in order to fetch resources.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private class  ExtDataBase.ExtSQLiteOpenHelper
      SQLiteOpenHelper help to get open ExtDataBase and create the DataBase when it does not exist.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private static String dataBaseFileName
      DataBase path template the first should be replaced by sdcard path and the second should be replaced by PackageName.
      private SQLiteDatabase mDB 
      private static ExtDataBase singleton 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明
      private ExtDataBase() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static SQLiteDatabase getDateBase() 
      static ExtDataBase getInstance() 
      void init(Context ctx)
      Initializing mDB.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    • 字段详细资料

      • dataBaseFileName

        private static final String dataBaseFileName
        DataBase path template the first should be replaced by sdcard path and the second should be replaced by PackageName.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • singleton

        private static ExtDataBase singleton

      • mDB

        private SQLiteDatabase mDB

    • 构造器详细资料

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDateBase

        public static SQLiteDatabase getDateBase()

      • getInstance

        public static ExtDataBase getInstance()

      • init

        public void init(Context ctx)
        Initializing mDB. This method must be called before calling getDataBase.
        参数:
        ctx - parameter is used to get resources PackageName and SDCard Path.
